user_instruction: 'Assist me in responding to Mark'"'"'s recent inquiry about bank procedures (mark@trustwellbank.com). You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Details on Mark’s Recent Inquiry  

Hi [Team/Assistant],

Could you please:

1. Check my Gmail for the latest message from Mark (mark@trustwellbank.com) regarding teller/bank procedures and forward or summarize its contents (including any attachments).  
2. Look in our Notion workspace for the most up-to-date teller procedure documentation and any notes that might address the questions Mark raised.  
3. Send me a concise summary of both the email and the pertinent Notion pages, along with direct links, so I can prepare an accurate response to him.

Thank you very much for your help!

Best,  
Jane

final_output:

Thank you very much for your help!
